verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
I can hear the footsteps of my King
I can hear his heartbeat beckoning
In my darkness, He has set me free
Now I hear the spirit calling me, He's calling

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Wake up child, It's our turn to shine
We were born for such a time as this
Wake up child, It's our turn to shine
We were born for such a time as this

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
I can hear a holy rumbling
I've begun to preach another King
Loosing chains and breaking down the walls
I want to hear the Father when he calls, He's calling

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge: 1
This is the anthem of our generation,
Here we are God, shake our nation
All we need is your love
You captivate us

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Bridge: 2
We are royalty
We have destiny
We have been set free
We're gonna shake history
